welcome_message_body: Welcome to Golden, a charming city nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains. Known for its rich history, outdoor adventures, and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that Golden has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing ticketing counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Southwest Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving primarily Delta Air Lines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limits.
